by.khmyl.cafe.receiver.impl

Class AdminReceiverImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.khmyl.cafe.receiver.AdminReceiver
      • by.khmyl.cafe.receiver.impl.AdminReceiverImpl

  • public class AdminReceiverImpl
extends AdminReceiver
    Realizes validation of admin's requests and if they are valid sends them for further processing.
